To plot our sequence ATGAACACTC with this method, we take two nucleotides at a time. Commencing from the origin, we move to the first dinucleotide AT, r
W and arrive at P 1, the first point on the 3D curve. Proceeding from P 1, we move towards the dinucleotide TG, r
K and reach the second point P 2. Progressing in this manner (Table 9.18), we get the curve as shown in Fig. 9.10.
